CustomField.formula: OR( fferpcore__MessageType2__c == null, AND( fferpcore__LastAttemptedDelivery__c <= fferpcore__MessageType2__r.fferpcore__ExpiryCutoff__c, OR( ISPICKVAL(fferpcore__State__c, 'Complete'), ISPICKVAL(fferpcore__State__c,'Errors'), ISPICKVAL(fferpcore__State__c,'Void'))))
CustomField.label: Deletable
